text: The Colombia women's national handball team is the national team of Colombia. It is governed by the Federacion Colombiana de Balomano and takes part in international handball competitions. ==Results== ===Pan American Championship=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position !GP !W !D* !L !GS !GA |- | 1999 ||round robin||6th||5||0||0||5||58||226 |- | 2000 ||round robin||6th||5||0||0||5||63||148 |- | 2017 ||9th place match||9th||5||1||0||4||95||165 |} ===Central American and Caribbean Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%;" |- !Games !Round !Position ! ! ! ! ! ! |- |style="border: 3px solid red"| 2018 Barranquilla |5th place game |6th |5 |2 |0 |3 |93 |117 |} ===Caribbean Handball Cup=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position !GP !W !D* !L !GS !GA |- |style="border: 3px solid red"| 2017||6th place match||6||6||0||0||6||126||189 |} ===Bolivarian Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%;" |- !Games !Round !Position ! ! ! ! ! ! |- |style="border: 3px solid red" align=left| 2017 Santa Marta |round robin |4th |5 |2 |0 |3 |149 |107 |} ==External links== * *IHF profile Category:Women's national handball teams Handball National team
